subject: [Radiance-general] UDI upper limits
body:
Hi all,

I have seen several definitions of the UDI illuminance ranges around, with "UDI-e" (exceed) starting at 2000, 2500 or 3000lx. I really wonder what is the commonly used range these days? Can anyone here share some insight on this moving target for daylighting optimizations? ;)

Cheers, Lars.
